profile:
XTERIORS provides home owners and businesses in Southern Ontario with full service exterior renovations.  Our services include Roofing, Siding, Eavestroughs, Aluminum and more.

The home exterior is the first impression your house etches into onlooker's minds. It contributes to the atmosphere of your neighbourhood, attracts potential buyers and affects the value of your home.

Our experts specialize in all aspects of exterior maintenance, renovations and design to perfect house curb appeal.  We understand the importance of the value of your house along with how imperative high quality work during renovations is.

That's why our experienced team of professionals are not employees, but owners... Every renovation, every project is treated as if it were our own, guaranteeing impeccable craftsmanship.

We've backed this claim up with our Guaranteed 10-Year Workmanship Warranty.
